intro.description:
This cheat sheet will demonstrate how to install and uninstall a feature using Install/Update.
To learn more about using cheat sheets, click the help button in the top right corner (?).

item.title: Register the update site with Eclipse
item.description: To register the update site with Eclipse, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select "Help->Install New Software..." from the main menu to launch the "Install" wizard
Click "Add..."
Click "Local...", browse to "C:\helloworld.site" in the dialog. Click "OK" to add the site
Note that the "Install" wizard changes to display the contents of the added site

item.title: Install the feature
item.description: To install the feature, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Ensure that 'Install' wizard is open. If not, launch it by selecting "Help->Install New Software..." from the main menu
Select the "C:\helloworld.site" site in the "Work with" combo
If the "Group items by category" option is checked, the "Hello World!" feature category should be visible
Check the "Hello World! Feature" feature
Click "Next >". The installer will calculate what needs to be installed
Select the "Hello World! Feature" entry in the feature table on the "Install Details" page
Verify that "Details" section displays the feature description as "Hello, Eclipse world! feature description"
Click Next. "Review Licenses" page will come up displaying the license "Hello, Eclipse world! license agreement" in the "License text" text box
Accept the license by clicking the option "I accept the terms of the license agreement"
Click "Finish" to install the feature
When the installation completes, a dialog asking you to restart will open. Click "Yes" to restart and finish the install

item.title: Verify the feature installation
item.description: To verify the feature installation, perform the following steps after Eclipse restarts:

subitem.label: Select "Help->About Eclipse SDK" from the main menu
Click "Installation Details" button on the "About Eclipse SDK" dialog box
Note the "Hello World! Feature" on "Installed Software" tab of the "Eclipse SDK Installations Details" dialog

item.title: Uninstall the feature
item.description: To uninstall the feature, perform the following steps:

subitem.label: Select the "Hello World! Feature" feature within the table on "Installed Software" tab of the "Eclipse SDK Installations Details" dialog box
Click "Uninstall..." button
Click "Finish" in the resulting "Uninstall" dialog box
Click "Yes" from the "Software Updates" dialog box to restart the Eclipse workbench
